entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is described as 'tough', 'brave', and the 'consummate survivor'. He was a close friend of Tonks and Harry's protégé at the Ministry of Magic. (Excerpt: 'so tough, so brave, the consummate survivor... his favorite and his protégé at the Ministry of Magic.')

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as laughing together with George in the living room. (Excerpt: 'Fred and George were laughing together.')

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as laughing together with Fred in the living room. (Excerpt: 'Fred and George were laughing together.')

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as crying silently into a handkerchief after hearing about Mad-Eye's death. She was close to Mad-Eye. (Excerpt: 'Tonks was crying silently into a handkerchief; She had been close to Mad-Eye...')

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as sitting down on the floor in the corner and dabbing at his eyes with a large handkerchief. (Excerpt: 'Hagrid, who had sat down on the ﬂoor in the corner where he had most space, was dabbing at his eyes with his tablecloth-sized handkerchief.')

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as leading the group back into the Burrow and living room after Mad-Eye's death. (Excerpt: 'and in silence they followed Mr. and Mrs. Weasley back into the Burrow...')

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as leading the group back into the Burrow and living room after Mad-Eye's death. (Excerpt: 'and in silence they followed Mr. and Mrs. Weasley back into the Burrow...')

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the place where Mad-Eye was Harry's protégé. (Excerpt: 'his favorite and his protégé at the Ministry of Magic.')

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is described as the place where the group went after Mad-Eye's death. (Excerpt: 'and in silence they followed Mr. and Mrs. Weasley back into the Burrow...')

entities.name: living room
entities.description: The living room is described as the place where Fred and George were laughing together. (Excerpt: 'where Fred and George were laughing together.')

relationships.description: Tonks was close to Mad-Eye, as mentioned in the text. (Excerpt: 'She had been close to Mad-Eye...')
Mad-Eye was Harry's protégé at the Ministry of Magic, as mentioned in the text. (Excerpt: 'his favorite and his protégé at the Ministry of Magic.')
Mad-Eye was Harry's mentor or protégé, as mentioned in the text. (Excerpt: 'his favorite and his protégé at the Ministry of Magic.')
Fred and George are described as twins or close siblings, as they were laughing together in the living room. (Excerpt: 'Fred and George were laughing together.')

Mr. Weasley and Mrs. Weasley are described as a married couple, as they led the group back into the Burrow together. (Excerpt: 'and in silence they followed Mr. and Mrs. Weasley back into the Burrow...')
